dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will meticulously review and analyze new information to ensure accuracy.
Your FarTwin will quickly absorb and apply new information, often without fully understanding the details.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with people from different backgrounds?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach interactions with people from different backgrounds with empathy and understanding.
Your FarTwin will be more reserved in interactions with people from different backgrounds, preferring to observe before contributing.

dimensions.label: Technical Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will think creatively and outside the box to solve technical problems.
Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts, using a systematic approach.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze data and make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully evaluate evidence, considering multiple perspectives before drawing conclusions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and gut feelings to make decisions, often without fully analyzing the data.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively collaborate and support team members to achieve shared goals.
Your FarTwin will prioritize their own success over the needs of others, sometimes at the expense of teamwork.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks, manage distractions, and stay focused to achieve deadlines.
Your FarTwin will tend to procrastinate, taking a more relaxed approach to time management and deadlines.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express their needs and boundaries clearly, standing up for themselves in conflict situations.
Your FarTwin may shy away from conflict or difficult conversations, avoiding tension whenever possible.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly creative, drawing from a wealth of ideas and imagination.
Your FarTwin will approach creative tasks with a systematic and methodical mindset, breaking down complex problems into smaller parts.
